# HTML IDs


<!-- WARNING: THIS FILE WAS AUTOGENERATED! DO NOT EDIT! -->

## SingleFileHtmlIds Class

This class provides centralized HTML ID constants for the single-file
transcription workflow. It extends `InteractionHtmlIds` from
`cjm-fasthtml-interactions` to inherit base interaction pattern IDs.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

<a
href="https://github.com/cj-mills/cjm-fasthtml-workflow-transcription-single-file/blob/main/cjm_fasthtml_workflow_transcription_single_file/core/html_ids.py#L12"
target="_blank" style="float:right; font-size:smaller">source</a>

### SingleFileHtmlIds

``` python

def SingleFileHtmlIds(
    args:VAR_POSITIONAL, kwargs:VAR_KEYWORD
):

```

*HTML ID constants for single-file transcription workflow.*

## Usage Examples

``` python
# Access workflow-specific IDs
container_id = SingleFileHtmlIds.WORKFLOW_CONTAINER
print(f"Workflow container ID: {container_id}")
print(f"Workflow container selector: {SingleFileHtmlIds.as_selector(container_id)}")
```

    Workflow container ID: sf-workflow-container
    Workflow container selector: #sf-workflow-container
